string: ALTER TABLE `welder_monitoring_datas` ADD `expiration_date` DATE NULL DEFAULT NULL;
ALTER TABLE `welder_monitoring_datas` CHANGE `recertification_in_year` `recertification_in_year` DECIMAL(11,2) NULL DEFAULT '0';
ALTER TABLE `welder_monitoring_datas` CHANGE `certified_date` `certified_date` DATE NULL DEFAULT NULL;
